issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Note this may not be a Titanium specific issue because obviously not all browsers support the same features*

Steps to reproduce
1. Launch the sample app provided once on an iOS device with OS >= 5.0 and once on iOS device < 5.0

Actual result:
Gradient backgrounds are shown on the buttons in iOS 5.0+, while they are not in iOS < 5.0 (Also not on Galaxy Tab 10.1 OS 3.0)

Expected result:
Gradient backgrounds are shown in both browsers
fields.summary: MobileWeb : Gradients - Various browsers support gradient backgrounds while others do not (e.g. Safari on iOS >= 5.0 does while Safari on iOS < 5.0 does not)
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.9.201202141208
Ti Mob SDK 2.0.0.v20120314090311
OSX Lion 10.7.3
iPad 1 OS 4.3.5, iPhone 4 OS 5.0.1, Galaxy Tab 10.1 OS 3.0

comments.body: Resolving as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
Closing old "Won't fix" tickets. If you disagree, please reopen.
